title: Sapphire Skies Resort
description: Sapphire Skies Resort is a full-fledged resort booking system offering user authentication, room availability, online payments, and an admin dashboard. Built using React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Clerk.

title: FaceRipple
description: FaceRipple is a real-time social communication app with video calling, messaging, and a friends system. It uses getStream for chat and WebRTC for video communication, with complete backend using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A sleek and responsive personal portfolio website that showcases my projects, resume, contact, and tech stack. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, animated with Framer Motion.

title: Tournament Management System
description: A PHP-based tournament system managing sports, regions, players, events, and matches. Includes admin control, sponsor tracking, and match visualization using advanced CSS styling.

title: AI-Powered Resume Builder
description: An AI-powered resume builder that allows users to generate professional resumes using AI suggestions, smart formatting, and PDF export functionality.

title: SpiderWeb Canvas Animation
description: An interactive canvas-based spiderweb animation integrated into the homepage of my portfolio. Created using HTML5 Canvas and requestAnimationFrame for smooth visuals.

title: Quiz App with Report Generation
tagline: Track Your Scores with PDF Reports
description: A Python-based quiz application using Tkinter, MySQL for user management and question storage. Generates result reports in PDF and sends via email.
